text: Bayakubuza ukuthi yini eyenziwe yabasemthethweni kubona (ukuba idliwe) ithi okusemthethweni kunina yizinto ezinhle nalezo zilwane enizifundisele ukuzingela nizifundise ngendlela anifundisa ngayo uMvelinqangi ngakho-ke yidlani kulokho ezinibambele kona bese nikhumbula igama likaMvelinqangi kulokho futhi nesabe uMvelinqangi ngempela uMvelinqangi uyashesha ekwahluleleni
